price: 25. Allah azali kobenga bato na ndako ya kimia, mpe akambaka oyo alingi o nzela ya semba.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yadʿū ilā dāri al-salāmi wayahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
